title: I'm from EUW, can I still be active in this "Community" ?
body:
Or will there be restrictions like being atleast level 5 ?
:)

replies.body: To build on what Aregionius stated, absolutely!  This is a community where we strongly encourage any Summoner to participate and help their fellow players out with Technical issues/concerns.  :)

Ah, ok. Thx :D Well then I'd like to report my first bug, just play Yi with Mecurial Scimitar and you will have ALL THE CLEANSES ! I mean like really, since the cleanse effect of Mecurial Scimitar goes off every time he uses his q, while his ult is on :)
If you can post here now, you can post here now :)  The EU community will also be modified in the same way.
